txt.en:
Carry-alls help organize your inventory by storing specific types of items.

To rename your carry-all, click the quill button, then click in the name bar and type. Use the check button that appears to confirm your new name, the X button to cancel your new name, or the reset button to restore the default name of the carry-all.

The Gather button at the bottom will move all appropriate items from your inventory into the carry-all or you may drag individual items into the carry-all. Check the Auto box to automatically gather new items into the carry-all. To withdraw items from the carry-all select a stack and press the left arrow button.

The binding column will indicate bound to character items in your carry-all. Withdraw these bound items to restore your carry-all to bound to account.
